sentence.Network_en: This is another half-baked scheme that isn't going to work.
sentence.Network_cn: 这又是一个不靠谱的计划，是不会成功的。

sentence.Network_en: Jim's got some half - baked idea about converting his garage into a sauna.
sentence.Network_cn: 吉姆初步计划把他的车库改造成一个蒸汽浴室.

sentence.Network_en: Don't listen to his half - baked ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要听他那思虑不周详的主意.

all up - 英汉词典 ... a leg up 占上风 half-baked 肤浅的，半吊子 - Clam up 守口如瓶，拒不开口，沉默不语.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... hale 强壮的>虚弱的 half-baked 不完整的>详细计划的 halfhearted 不热心的>狂热的.

list.abs: 飞片小集合 ... 恐惧拉斯维加斯 Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas 抢救肯尼小子 Half Baked 谋杀绿脚趾 The Big Lebowski.

entry.tran: （想法、计划等）考虑不周的，愚蠢的，不切实际的
entry.def: If you describe an idea or plan as half-baked, you mean that it has not been properly thought out, and so is stupid or impractical.

example.ex: This is another half-baked scheme that isn't going to work...
example.tran: 这又是一个不靠谱的计划，是不会成功的。

example.ex: I didn't want to make things worse by coming up with half-baked notions.
example.tran: 我可不想一拍脑门想出些馊主意而把事情搞得更糟。

sentences.sentence: "a screwball proposal without a prayer of working"
